summary: Implements a handler for the Hammer open‑source language model that prepares and preprocesses prompts, formats task and instruction specifications, translates structured outputs into abstract syntax trees, decodes them into executable tool calls, runs the calls, and returns the execution results.
business_intent: Enable the Hammer model to participate in the function‑call leaderboard by providing full end‑to‑end support for tool‑use interactions, allowing developers to benchmark and compare LLMs that can invoke external functions.
